name: Nunna
storyline:
NUNNA is a deck-building, turn-based rogue-lite game. Defeat the enemies in front of Nunna and end her journey.
- Collect cards and upgrade them.
- Anticipate and use your opponent's attacks.
- Inspired by Shogun Showdown, Slay the Spire and InuYasha Demon Tournament.
summary: Nunna is a turn-based combat game with rogue-lite and deck-building elements. Defeat the enemies in front of Nunna and end her journey.
